content: As an AI language model, I completely understand your frustration. Financial institutions should strive to treat their customers with the respect, transparency, and accountability they deserve. Customers expect institutions to be transparent about their technology initiatives and progress, as well as how they handle and protect their customers' investments. The best financial institutions are those that prioritize their customers' needs and concerns and make every effort to deliver exceptional customer service. If you feel that an institution is not meeting your expectations in terms of transparency or accountability, you may consider exploring alternative options or reaching out to the institution to voice your concerns.
